People's Daily People's Daily full text RSS. Get more full text RSS: https://feedx.net http://www.people.com.cn/ 01版要闻 - 习近平向第六届中国国际进口博览会致信http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/06/nw.D110000renmrb_20231106_1-01.htm
;Monday, November 06, 2023
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, November 5th  On November 5th, President Xi Jinping addressed the Sixth Letter from China International Import Expo.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out that since 2018, the CIIE has been successfully held for five times. Relying on China’s large market advantages, it has given full play to its functions as a platform for international procurement, investment promotion, cultural exchanges, and open cooperation, and has contributed to accelerating the construction of a new development pattern and It has made positive contributions to promoting world economic development.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that at present, the world economic recovery lacks momentum and requires all countries to work together and seek common development. China will always be an important opportunity for world development, will firmly promote high-level opening up, and continue to promote economic globalization in a more open, inclusive, universally beneficial, balanced, and win-win direction. It is hoped that the CIIE will accelerate the improvement of its window function in building a new development pattern, provide new opportunities for the world with China's new development, give full play to its role as a platform to promote high-level opening up, and make China's big market a big market shared by the world; and better provide global sharing. international public goods and services to help promote the construction of an open world economy and allow win-win cooperation to benefit the world.

;

;The 6th China International Import Expo opened in Shanghai on the same day, with the theme of "New Era, Shared Future", hosted by the Ministry of Commerce and the Shanghai Municipal People's Government.

;; Mon, 06 Nov 2023 05:56:03 +0800 01版要闻 - 《习近平关于中国式现代化论述摘编》出版发行http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/06/nw.D110000renmrb_20231106_2-01.htm
;Monday, November 6, 2023
; ;

;Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, November 5th  "Xi Jinping" edited by the Party History and Literature Research Institute of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China The book "Excerpts of Discourses on Chinese Modernization" was recently published by the Central Literature Publishing House and distributed nationwide.

;

;Achieving modernization has been the dream that the Chinese people have been striving for since modern times. The history of the Communist Party of China uniting and leading the Chinese people in pursuit of national rejuvenation for more than 100 years is also a history of continuous exploration of the road to modernization. Based on long-term exploration and practice since the founding of New China, especially since the reform and opening up, and through innovative breakthroughs in theory and practice since the 18th National Congress, our party has successfully promoted and expanded Chinese-style modernization. Chinese-style modernization has created a new form of human civilization and presented a new picture of modernization. Practice has proved that Chinese-style modernization is feasible and stable, and is the only correct path to building a strong country and rejuvenating the nation. From now on, the central task of the Communist Party of China is to unite and lead the people of all ethnic groups in the country to comprehensively build a modern and powerful socialist country, achieve the second centenary goal, and comprehensively promote the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation with Chinese-style modernization. Comrade Xi Jinping has published a series of important expositions on Chinese-style modernization, which have lofty intentions, rich connotations and profound thoughts. They further deepen the understanding of the connotation and essence of Chinese-style modernization and summarize the Chinese characteristics, essential requirements and major principles that form Chinese-style modernization. Preliminarily building a theoretical system of Chinese-style modernization to make Chinese-style modernization clearer, more scientific, more tangible and feasible is of great significance for comprehensively promoting the construction of a strong country and the great cause of national rejuvenation with Chinese-style modernization in the new era and new journey.

;

;"Excerpts of Discourses" is divided into 7 topics, with a total of 522 paragraphs of discussion, excerpted from Comrade Xi Jinping's reports, speeches, explanations, speeches, talks, and congratulatory letters from November 15, 2012 to October 18, 2023. , replies, instructions and more than 220 important documents. Some of these discussions are published publicly for the first time.

;; Mon, 06 Nov 2023 05:56:03 +0800 01版要闻 - 让合作共赢惠及世界http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/06/nw.D110000renmrb_20231106_3-01.htm
;Monday, November 6, 2023
; ;

;“Since 2018, the CIIE has been successfully held for five times, relying on China’s large market advantages to give full play to international procurement and investment It has made positive contributions to accelerating the construction of a new development pattern and promoting world economic development.";

;

;"At present, the world economic recovery lacks momentum and requires all countries to work together and seek common development. . China will always be an important opportunity for world development, will firmly promote high-level opening up, and continue to promote economic globalization in a more open, inclusive, universally beneficial, balanced, and win-win direction"...

;

; President Xi Jinping’s letter to the Sixth China International Import Expo on November 5 aroused enthusiastic responses from all walks of life. Everyone believes that President Xi Jinping’s letter is inspiring and inspiring. It once again declares to the world China’s determination to firmly promote high-level opening up and continue to promote economic globalization. It demonstrates China’s sincerity in providing new opportunities for the world with China’s new development and contributes to promoting the construction of a The open world economy has injected strong impetus.

;

;;Provide new opportunities for the world with China’s new development;

;

;President Xi Jinping pointed out, “I hope that the CIIE will speed up the improvement of its window function in building a new development pattern, so as to China's new development provides new opportunities for the world."

;

;“President Xi Jinping’s letter conveys to the world China’s clear attitude towards promoting high-level opening up, and will surely boost the confidence of business communities in various countries to deepen mutually beneficial and win-win cooperation.” Zhang Shenfeng, Vice President of the China Council for the Promotion of International Trade, said, "We will strengthen the functions of connecting government and enterprises, integrating internal and external, and unblocking supply and demand, build diversified platforms, strive to maintain the stability and smoothness of industrial and supply chains, and demonstrate new responsibilities in promoting high-quality development, building a new development pattern, and helping to build an open world economy. New achievements."

;

;"President Xi Jinping's letter further strengthens our confidence in deeply exploring the global market, expanding exchanges and cooperation, and maintaining the stability and smoothness of the industrial and supply chains." Li Fanrong, Chairman of Sinochem China, said, Chemistry has participated in the CIIE for six consecutive years. At this CIIE, it will cooperate in depth with global partners in energy, green food and agricultural products, new chemical materials and other fields to effectively promote the green transformation and high-quality development of the industry. In the next step, we will base ourselves on opening up to the outside world at a higher level, deepen global cooperation, and contribute to building an open world economy with concrete measures and actions.

;

;“As a platform to promote high-level opening up, the CIIE provides new opportunities for all countries to achieve win-win development.” Wang Zhiqing, chairman and party secretary of China Eastern Airlines, introduced that China Eastern Airlines has leveraged its industry advantages and actively participated in the CIIE. Expo, serve the CIIE, and protect the CIIE. Next, we will rely on the China International Import Expo to promote high-level cooperation in the global aviation industry chain and achieve high-quality development.

;

;Xu Jian, Secretary of the Qingpu District Committee of Shanghai, said that the CIIE is a window for my country to build a new development pattern, a platform to promote high-level opening up, and an international public product shared globally. Qingpu District will continue to expand the CIIE It will have spillover effects, anchor the construction goal of "strategic empowerment area, digital innovation highland, happy and warm home", continue to promote the development of "big digital, big health, big commerce" leading industries, and continue to deepen high-level opening up.

;

;;Let China’s big market become a big market shared by the world;

;

;President Xi Jinping pointed out, “give full play to the role of a platform for promoting high-level opening up, let China’s big market Become a big market shared by the world."

;

;“President Xi Jinping’s letter releases a signal to the world about sharing opportunities and seeking common development, and points out the direction for our country to further promote high-level opening up.” Liu Jin, President of the Bank of China, said that the Bank of China will fully Give full play to the advantages of international operations, continuously expand the breadth and depth of financial services, effectively use important platforms such as the China International Import Expo, continue to promote deeper and more substantial international economic and trade cooperation, and help China's market become a large market shared by the world.

;

;Hao Yanling, a member of the Party Committee of China Supply and Marketing Group affiliated to the All-China Federation of Supply and Marketing Cooperatives, Secretary of the Party Committee and Chairman of China Agricultural Production Materials Group Co., Ltd., said that the CIIE allows the world to see that China’s door is opening wider and wider. Getting bigger also brings new market opportunities to the supply and marketing cooperative system. China Supply and Marketing Group will accelerate the pace of "going global", continue to deepen international trade cooperation, continue to introduce overseas high-quality agricultural resources, and meet the demand for agricultural materials in important grain-producing areas.

;

;“As an important window for China’s opening up to the outside world, the CIIE creates good opportunities for us to carry out higher-level and higher-quality international cooperation.” Zhang Jianqiu, senior executive president of Yili Group, said that Yili Group has participated in the CIIE 6 times. Expo, we must continue to "go out" at a high level, expand our circle of friends, continue to "bring in" high quality, and work with global partners to deepen technological innovation, accelerate digital and intelligent upgrading, practice green development, and move forward together A better future.

;

;Dai Chenli, deputy director of the Financial and Trade Department of the Lingang New Area Management Committee of the China (Shanghai) Pilot Free Trade Zone, said that the Lingang New Area will insist on being based in Shanghai, facing the world, and fully integrating with international high-standard economic and trade rules. , and strive to demonstrate greater performance and responsibility in building the "five centers" and strengthening the "four major functions" in Shanghai.

;

;;Help promote the construction of an open world economy;

;

;President Xi Jinping pointed out, “Better provide internationally shared international public goods and services and help promote the construction of an open world. Economy, let win-win cooperation benefit the world."

;

;“President Xi Jinping’s letter demonstrates China’s openness and confidence as a major country and its responsibility as a major country in promoting global economic development.” Fu Wanjun, President of the Agricultural Bank of China, said, “We will use this CIIE to Taking this opportunity, relying on the global business service network, focusing on serving the international cooperation and development of agriculture, comprehensively improving the quality and efficiency of cross-border financial services, in order to build a new development pattern and continue to promote economic globalization towards a more open, inclusive, inclusive and beneficial Make new contributions to the development of a balanced and win-win direction."

;

;"Chairman Xi Jinping's letter points out the direction for our central enterprises to fulfill their responsibilities and deepen mutually beneficial and win-win cooperation with countries around the world." China Machinery Industry Zhang Xiaolun, Secretary of the Party Committee and Chairman of the Group Co., Ltd., said that the Group has participated in and served the CIIE for six consecutive years. The next step will be to continue to make good use of the CIIE platform, coordinate and integrate global resources, strengthen international cooperation, strive to serve new industrialization, and promote Chinese-style industrialization. modernization.

;

;“The CIIE is an important measure for my country to promote a new round of high-level opening up to the outside world, and it is also an important platform for international agricultural cooperation.” You Wei, deputy general manager of COFCO, said that through the platform of the CIIE, COFCO Group continues to expand its "circle of friends" and effectively promotes the connection between the Chinese market and the world market. Facing the future, we will better rely on the CIIE platform, actively link up with global agricultural and food industry partners, expand cooperation space, and continue to help the global agricultural and food supply chain to be stable and smooth with openness and innovation.

;

;Yang Yanyan, President of the Guangxi Council for the Promotion of International Trade, said that he will continue to build a high-energy open platform to promote the regional business community to deeply participate in the joint construction of the "Belt and Road", strengthen the integration of cross-border industrial chains and supply chains, promote green development, and help promote Institutional openness and high-level openness.

;

;Li Pengcheng, CEO of Mengniu Group, said that the company will continue to rely on the CIIE platform and continue to inject new momentum into the growth of the world's dairy industry with the concept of "more nutritious, smarter and greener" and contribute to the development of the global dairy industry. Open up new space, create a new model for international dairy industry cooperation, and allow global consumers to share high-quality products and services.

;

;Tong Jisheng, Secretary of the Party Committee and Chairman of Oriental International (Group) Co., Ltd., said that it is necessary to seize the opportunity of the CIIE and provide one-stop services such as exhibition recruitment, investment promotion, logistics, and booth construction to continuously expand the spillover effects. Provide transaction services for global exhibitors and domestic buyers, further operate the China-Europe Express Shanghai and CIIE trains, and use greater efforts to promote the "turning of exhibits into commodities" at the CIIE and achieve mutual benefit and win-win "acceleration".

;

;(Our reporters Du Haitao, Ouyang Jie, Lin Lili, Zhu Jun, Li Xiaohong, Li Xinping, Xie Weiqun, Luo Shanshan, Qiu Chaoyi, Qi Zhiming, Ge Mengchao, Tian Hong, Ju Yunpeng, Pang Geping)

;; Mon, 06 Nov 2023 05:56:03 +0800 01版要闻 - 李强出席第六届中国国际进口博览会开幕式并发表主旨演讲http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/06/nw.D110000renmrb_20231106_4-01.htm
;Monday, November 06, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;November 5, Premier Li Qiang of the State Council attended the opening ceremony of the 6th China International Import Expo and Hongqiao International Economic Forum in Shanghai and delivered a keynote speech.
;Photographed by Xinhua News Agency reporter Zhai Jianlan

;
; ;

;This newspaper, Shanghai, November 5th   (Reporters Tian Hong, Yang Xun, Luo Shanshan) On November 5, Premier Li Qiang attended the opening ceremony of the 6th China International Import Expo and Hongqiao International Economic Forum in Shanghai and delivered a keynote speech.

;

;Li Qiang said that President Xi Jinping sent a special letter to this CIIE, reaffirming China’s firm determination to promote high-level opening up and promote the construction of an open world economy. As the world's first national-level exhibition with the theme of imports, the CIIE has actively connected China and the world since its inception. The role of the four major platforms of international procurement, investment promotion, cultural exchanges, and open cooperation has been continuously enhanced, and the international public relations shared by the world have been continuously enhanced. Product attributes are more evident.

;

;After sharing several specific "CIIE stories" with everyone, Li Qiang pointed out that economic globalization is the historical trend and the aspiration of the people. Open cooperation, mutual benefit and win-win are the wisest and most natural choices. . China sincerely hopes to work with other countries to meet each other halfway and achieve mutual success on the big open stage, promote economic globalization in a more open, inclusive, universally beneficial, balanced and win-win direction, and contribute to world economic recovery and global development and prosperity. Make greater contributions.

;

;Li Qiang emphasized that this year marks the 45th anniversary of China’s reform and opening up. China will continue to promote opening up with "greater market opportunities", actively expand imports, implement the national and pilot free trade zone negative lists for cross-border services trade, and continue to create huge market dividends for the world. Continue to promote opening-up with "better alignment of rules", build more high-level open platforms such as the Free Trade Pilot Zone and Hainan Free Trade Port, and actively promote joining the "Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership" and the "Digital Economy Partnership Agreement" , further relax market access and protect the rights and interests of foreign investors in accordance with the law. Continue to promote opening up with "more innovative momentum", strengthen innovation cooperation and achievement sharing with all parties, strive to break down barriers that restrict the flow of innovation factors, deepen reforms in the digital economy, and promote the orderly and free flow of data in accordance with the law. We will continue to promote "stronger inclusive and shared" opening up, resolutely safeguard the authority and effectiveness of the multilateral trading system, fully and deeply participate in the reform of the WTO, unswervingly promote the stability of global industrial and supply chains, deepen the "Belt and Road" cooperative partnership, and resolutely Oppose unilateralism and protectionism. At the same time, Shanghai will better play its important role in opening up to the outside world, promote the high-level institutional opening of the Shanghai Pilot Free Trade Zone, and build a "Silk Road E-commerce" cooperation pioneer zone in Shanghai.

;

;Australian Prime Minister Albanese, Cuban Prime Minister Marrero, Kazakhstan Prime Minister Smailov, Serbian Prime Minister Brnabic, Iranian First Vice President Mukhbel, South African Vice President Mashatile , Deputy Prime Minister of Vietnam Tran Hong Ha, Deputy Prime Minister of Azerbaijan Mustafayev, Fiji Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Trade Kami Kamiga, Nicaraguan Presidential Advisor on Investment, Trade and International Cooperation Ortega, Thai Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Commerce Pu Tan, Secretary-General of the United Nations Conference on Trade and Development Alan Greenspan, and about 1,500 representatives from political, business and academic circles from 154 countries, regions and international organizations around the world attended the opening ceremony.

;

;The foreign leaders attending the meeting said in their speeches that the CIIE has become an important platform for global economic and trade cooperation, reflecting China’s commitment to deepening reforms and expanding opening up as a major country, and is willing to work with China to further strengthen trade, Cooperate in investment, technology, infrastructure, e-commerce, health and other fields, promote the construction of the “Belt and Road”, firmly support free trade, support the World Trade Organization in playing its authoritative role, promote trade and investment liberalization and facilitation, and maintain international industrial and supply chains Stable and smooth, achieving inclusive and sustainable development of the world.

;

;Before the opening ceremony, Li Qiang visited the enterprise exhibition. After the opening ceremony, Li Qiang toured the museum together with the foreign leaders attending the meeting.

;

;He Lifeng, Chen Jining and Wu Zhenglong participated in the above activities.

;; Mon, 06 Nov 2023 05:56:03 +0800 01版要闻 - 坚定推进高水平开放http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/06/nw.D110000renmrb_20231106_5-01.htm
;Monday, November 6, 2023
; ;

;"China will always be an important opportunity for world development and will firmly promote high-level opening up." On November 5, President Xi Jinping sent a letter to the Sixth China International Import Expo, fully affirming the contribution made by the consecutive successful holding of the CIIE, deeply understanding the difficulties and challenges facing the world economy, and solemnly declaring China’s determination to promote high-level opening up. Determined to put forward high expectations for the CIIE to better play its functional role, it has injected strong positive energy into promoting the construction of an open world economy and promoting the recovery of the world economy.

;

;Holding the China International Import Expo is a major decision made by China to promote a new round of high-level opening up to the outside world. It is a major initiative for China to open its market to the world. The purpose is to expand opening up and let China expand. The market has become the world's great opportunity. Since 2018, the CIIE has been successfully held for five times. Relying on China's large market advantages, it has given full play to its functions as a platform for international procurement, investment promotion, cultural exchanges, and open cooperation, and has made positive contributions to accelerating the construction of a new development pattern and promoting world economic development. The world's first import-themed national exhibition, which was personally planned, proposed, deployed and promoted by President Xi Jinping, has become a window for China to build a new development pattern, a platform for promoting high-level opening up, and a platform for global sharing. international public goods. With the theme of "New Era, Shared Future", this year's CIIE has a record number of Fortune 500 companies and industry leading companies participating in the expo, which will surely provide more market opportunities, investment opportunities, and growth opportunities for all parties, and gather strength. Promote development together.

;

;Openness is a distinctive symbol of contemporary China. This year marks the 45th anniversary of reform and opening up. Promoting reform and development through opening up is an important magic weapon for my country's modernization drive to continuously achieve new achievements. Especially since the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, China has implemented a more proactive opening-up strategy, built a high-standard free trade zone network for the world, accelerated the construction of free trade pilot zones and Hainan Free Trade Port, and jointly built the "Belt and Road" as a deep-seated Popular international public goods and international cooperation platform. my country has become a major trading partner of more than 140 countries and regions, ranking first in the world in terms of total trade in goods, leading the world in attracting foreign capital and overseas investment, forming a larger-scale, wider-field, and deeper opening-up pattern. In the past 10 years, China's average annual contribution to world economic growth has exceeded 30%. Since the beginning of this year, China's economy has maintained a rebounding trend. China has the institutional advantages of a socialist market economy, the demand advantage of a very large-scale market, the supply advantage of a complete industrial system, and the talent advantage of a large number of high-quality workers and entrepreneurs. China's economy is highly resilient, has great potential, and is full of vitality. Its long-term positive fundamentals have not changed. It has made outstanding contributions to ensuring the safe and smooth flow of industrial and supply chains and promoting the steady and solid progress of the world economic recovery. Practice has fully proved that China's continuous expansion of opening up to the outside world has not only developed itself, but also benefited the world.

;

;Currently, changes in the world, the times, and history are unfolding in an unprecedented way. The world's economic recovery lacks momentum and requires all countries to work together and seek common development. We must deeply realize that the world economy will prosper if it is open, and will decline if it is closed. Opening up is an important driving force for the progress of human civilization and the only way for world prosperity and development. Only by using openness to relieve development difficulties, using openness to gather the power of cooperation, using openness to gather the momentum of innovation, and using openness to seek shared benefits, and promote economic globalization continuously forward, can we enhance the development momentum of all countries. Humanity is an interdependent community with a shared future. Only by always adhering to win-win cooperation, striving to make the "cake" of mutually beneficial cooperation bigger, and jointly building an open and inclusive world economy can development results benefit people of all countries more and more equitably.

;

;When the world is good, China will be good; when China is good, the world will be better. China is comprehensively advancing the great cause of building a strong country and rejuvenating the nation with Chinese-style modernization. Adhering to peaceful development, seeking its own development while resolutely safeguarding world peace and development, using its own development to better safeguard world peace and development, and promoting the construction of a community with a shared future for mankind are the outstanding features of Chinese-style modernization. We open our doors and welcome anyone who wants to cooperate with us. As a super-large economy, China will always be an important opportunity for world development. It will promote all countries to share opportunities in China's large market, share opportunities for institutional opening up, and share opportunities for deepening international cooperation; it will firmly promote high-level opening up and expand market access. , create a first-class business environment that is market-oriented, rule-by-law, and international; we will always adhere to true multilateralism, promote the construction of an open world economy, and continue to promote economic globalization toward a more open, inclusive, universally beneficial, balanced, and win-win situation. direction of development. As President Xi Jinping hopes, the CIIE will "accelerate the improvement of its window function in building a new development pattern, provide new opportunities for the world with China's new development; give full play to its role as a platform to promote high-level opening up, and make China's big market a big market shared by the world." market; better provide internationally shared international public goods and services, help promote the construction of an open world economy, and allow win-win cooperation to benefit the world." It will surely become an important way to smooth the domestic and international dual cycles and firmly promote the process of high-level opening up in China. play a greater role and make greater contributions.

;

;Capitalize on the general trend of history and take the right path in the world. In today's world, the historical trend of peace, development, cooperation and win-win is unstoppable, the people's yearning for a better life is unstoppable, and the desire of all countries to achieve common development and prosperity is unstoppable. History has repeatedly proven that openness, inclusiveness, and win-win cooperation are the right path in the world. If all countries join hands to build more consensus on openness and jointly overcome difficulties and challenges, the spring breeze of openness will surely warm the world and bring a new bright future to global development.

; Mon, 06 Nov 2023 05:56:03 +0800 01版要闻 - 在深学细悟笃行中汲取奋进力量（学思想 强党性 重实践 建新功）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/06/nw.D110000renmrb_20231106_6-01.htm
;Monday, November 6, 2023
; ;

;Since the launch of the second batch of thematic education on studying and implementing Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, various localities have insisted on "learning ideological "As the primary task, we should closely integrate our own reality, take multiple measures to promote it, and strive to focus on deepening, internalizing, and transforming, and promote party members and cadres to draw strength from in-depth study, careful understanding, and sincere practice.

;

;All localities firmly grasp the general requirements of thematic education, give full play to their own advantages, and promote theoretical learning into the brain and heart.

;

;On the basis of intensive reading of the required readings for further study, the Hebei Shijiazhuang Municipal Party Committee also used books such as "Let the Masses Live a Good Life - Xi Jinping's Zhengding Footprints" as vivid teaching materials for "learning ideas". Organize and carry out concentrated study, exchange and seminars. The city's 132 thematic education units and more than 22,000 grassroots party organizations relied on the "Three Meetings and One Lesson" and thematic party days to organize party members and cadres to deeply study and understand the spiritual essence and connotation of Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era.

;

;The Fuzhou Municipal Committee of Fujian has thoroughly studied and implemented the excellent style of "going down to the grassroots all the way" advocated by General Secretary Xi Jinping when he was working in Fujian, studied books such as "Xi Jinping in Fuzhou", and formed a list of Fuzhou-themed education features; held relevant Exhibition, and selected 47 special teaching points, 82 special research points, and opened 24 special courses to panoramically present the practical results left by General Secretary Xi Jinping during his work in Fuzhou; sort out the Junmen Community, Three Lanes and Seven Lanes, etc. Line, organize party members and leading cadres to go deep into the grassroots masses and deeply understand scientific thinking methods and working methods.

;

;The second batch of thematic education units has a wide range, many types and large numbers. Each locality has accurately targeted the requirements, strengthened classified guidance, consolidated responsibilities at all levels, and improved the theoretical learning effect of grassroots party organizations.

;

;Nanchang City, Jiangxi Province has refined the three key measures of "carrying out theoretical study, promoting entrepreneurship among officials, and carefully reviewing and rectifying". From 12 aspects including organizing party members to do a good job in personal self-study and conducting study and discussion, it has listed out the measures that are in line with various aspects. A list of actual prescribed actions for party organizations and party members in various fields; formulating requirements for grassroots party organizations to carry out thematic education and guidance, for townships (villages), streets (communities), agencies, schools, hospitals, state-owned enterprises, new economic organizations, new social organizations and other fields , providing classified guidance on what to study, where to study, how to study, and who will organize it.

;

;Guizhou Guiyang City pays attention to the linkage between the upper and lower levels, and does a good job in grading and classification to promote learning. The city strives to give full play to the role of working committees of government agencies, education, hospitals, non-public enterprises and social organizations, as well as industry party committees of new employment groups, and effectively grasp theoretical study in detail and in place. For party members of new economic organizations, new social organizations, new employment groups and mobile party members, rely on the party-mass service center, party member activity room, "red station", "driver's home" and other positions to learn intensively, through the "Guizhou Online Academy", Online platforms such as "Building Hongyun" and the branch WeChat group provide independent learning, and adopt methods such as leadership by the branch secretary, guidance by party-building instructors, and pairing of students to promote effective coverage of theoretical learning for party members and cadres.

;

;The theory must be learned thoroughly and thoroughly in order to achieve the expected goals and better guide practice. All localities pay attention to the learning effect, adhere to the practice orientation, and promote theoretical learning to go deeper, deeper, and deeper into the heart.

;

;Taiyuan City, Shanxi Province conducts monthly exchanges and discussions around five topics including party building, high-quality development, and scientific and technological self-reliance. Each unit determines the topics based on actual conditions and discusses understandings based on actual work and job responsibilities. , talk about gains, talk about ideas, talk about measures, and focus on using learning results to guide practice and promote development. At the same time, efforts should be made to supervise learning, build a liaison system between the municipal party committee’s theme office-liaison group-county-level leadership team, refine monthly task lists and weekly work reminders, timely grasp learning progress, and supervise implementation.

;

;Changsha City, Hunan Province attaches great importance to the integration of learning with practice. Focusing on the implementation of the "three highs and four new" beautiful blueprint drawn by General Secretary Xi Jinping for Hunan and the spirit of important instructions on Changsha work, the Standing Committee of the Municipal Party Committee has carried out in-depth Special topic study and exchange discussions, research, planning and implementation of specific ideas and measures. In addition, the "Changsha Lecture Hall" was held to carry out special training on advanced manufacturing, rural revitalization, social governance, etc., to educate and guide party members and cadres to connect unit functions and job responsibilities, learn, think, practice, practice carefully, and embody the learning results to solve problems. , promote development and benefit people’s livelihood.

;

;The more clearly you know, the more earnestly you will act. At present, the majority of grassroots party organizations, party members, and cadres insist on using Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era to unite their hearts and souls, and their theoretical study continues to deepen. Everyone expressed that they should strengthen their ideals and beliefs and have the courage to take responsibility through theoretical study and ideological arming.

;; Mon, 06 Nov 2023 05:56:03 +0800 01版要闻 - 乡村新画卷http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/06/nw.D110000renmrb_20231106_7-01.htm
;Monday, November 06, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;< /TR>;;
;;
;

;

;
; ;

;In recent years, Wuhu City, Anhui Province has insisted on implementing the concept of green development, comprehensively promoted rural revitalization, and strived to create a beautiful ecological environment, prosperous industries, and people A new picture of rich, livable, and beautiful countryside. In 2022, the added value of Wuhu's primary industry was 17.925 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 4.3%; the per capita disposable income of rural permanent residents was 29,210 yuan, a year-on-year increase of 7.4%.

;

;The picture shows the fields, villages, roads, water systems, etc. forming a beautiful autumn picture in Eqiao Town, Sanshan Economic Development Zone, Wuhu City recently.

;

;Photo by Xiao Benxiang (Image China)

; Mon, 06 Nov 2023 05:56:03 +0800 02版要闻 - 让中国大市场成为世界共享的大市场http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/06/nw.D110000renmrb_20231106_1-02.htm
;Monday, November 6, 2023
; ;

;On November 5, President Xi Jinping sent a letter to the Sixth China International Import Expo. President Xi Jinping emphasized that China will always be an important opportunity for world development, will firmly promote high-level opening up, and continue to promote economic globalization in a more open, inclusive, universally beneficial, balanced, and win-win direction. International participants interviewed by our reporter said that President Xi Jinping's letter once again demonstrated to the world China's firm confidence in expanding opening up and promoting common development, and pointed the way for the CIIE to better promote win-win cooperation among all parties.

;

;;“A link connecting global trade and a bridge leading to win-win cooperation”;

;

;President Xi Jinping pointed out that since 2018, the CIIE has been successfully held for five times. Relying on China's large market advantages, it has given full play to its functions as a platform for international procurement, investment promotion, cultural exchanges, and open cooperation, and has made positive contributions to accelerating the construction of a new development pattern and promoting world economic development.

;

;Roy Billa, Deputy Minister of Industry and Commerce of Zimbabwe, who attended the opening ceremony of this CIIE, told reporters: "President Xi Jinping emphasized the four major platform functions of the CIIE in his letter. As a world-class As a grand economic and trade event, the CIIE has played a positive role in deepening global economic and trade cooperation, promoting corporate innovation, and promoting global development."

;

;The American 3M Company, which has participated in the exhibition for six consecutive years, has used the CIIE platform to promote a variety of innovative products Products are introduced into the Chinese market. Edward Carretta, global senior vice president of 3M Company, told reporters that the CIIE is a platform for open cooperation, and China's opening-up policy has truly benefited companies from all over the world. "I believe that the development dividends brought by the CIIE to companies from various countries will continue to be released."

;

;Xie Weibo, President of Danone China, North Asia and Oceania of France, attended the opening ceremony of this CIIE. This is his sixth Participated in the opening ceremony of the CIIE for the first time. He said that China has accelerated the construction of a new development pattern and continuously promoted high-quality economic development, which has had a positive impact on world economic cooperation and global trade development, and provided a steady stream of opportunities for foreign-invested enterprises in China.

;

;Shi Daocheng, CEO of the UK-based Rio Tinto Group, is deeply touched by the positive role played by the CIIE. He said: "With the help of the CIIE platform, we continue to carry out high-level and professional dialogues with our partners to explore new development ideas. The CIIE has become a link connecting global trade and a bridge leading to win-win cooperation.";

;“President Xi Jinping’s letter sends a signal to the world that China insists on win-win cooperation. It allows us to see China’s determination to adhere to a high level of opening up to the outside world, and it also strengthens our confidence in deeply exploring the Chinese market.” Love Huang Yongmin, the person in charge of Jasmine Pacific China, said that the company has participated in the CIIE for six consecutive years and has witnessed China’s opening door opening wider and wider. "As the scale of the Chinese market continues to expand, the 'circle of friends' at the CIIE will become larger and larger."

;

;;"Feel the vitality, potential and great attraction of the Chinese market";

;

;“President Xi Jinping emphasized that China will firmly promote high-level opening up, which gives Danish companies confidence in developing in the Chinese market.” Michel Moller, global market consultant of the Confederation of Danish Industry, said that China is Denmark’s As an important trading partner, there are more than 20 Danish food companies participating in the exhibition this year, 7 of which have participated in the exhibition for six consecutive years and 5 of which are participating for the first time. “Seeing the huge opportunities and unlimited potential in the Chinese market, more and more Danish companies are participating in the CIIE.”

;

;Anne Luo, a member of the executive committee of the German company Siemens Energy AG, participated in the CIIE for the first time this year. meeting. She said: "China is promoting the common development of all countries with a high level of opening up to the outside world. Seeing the colorful booths at this CIIE, I feel the vitality, potential and great attraction of the Chinese market. This year, including Siemens Energy More than 130 German companies, including the Chinese government, participated in the CIIE, which fully demonstrates the confidence of German companies in China's economic development."

;

;"President Xi Jinping's letter sent a clear signal to the world: China's open door will The more we open, the bigger we open." Jean-Christophe Bonnto, global senior vice president of Pfizer, said that as one of the first foreign pharmaceutical companies to enter the Chinese market, Pfizer has witnessed the rapid development of the Chinese market and pharmaceutical industry. China continues to optimize its drug review and approval process, promoting the launch of more and more innovative products. Bonnto said that American companies have been actively participating in the CIIE, reflecting the positive effect of the CIIE in promoting open cooperation.

;

;"President Xi Jinping's letter makes us convinced that China's door to the outside world will not be closed. All economies must actively participate in the process of economic globalization, promote development through openness, and seek win-win results through cooperation." United Nations Ke Ruizhi, Director of the Division of Globalization and Development Strategies of UNCTAD, said that the current world economic recovery is sluggish, and both developed and developing countries need a more open Chinese market and new opportunities brought by China's new development.

;

;;“Looking forward to discovering more ‘CIIE opportunities’ and ‘China opportunities’”;

;

;Chairman Xi Jinping emphasized that he hopes that the CIIE will speed up its improvement and build a new development pattern.的窗口功能，以中国新发展为世界提供新机遇；充分发挥推动高水平开放的平台作用，让中国大市场成为世界共享的大市场；更好提供全球共享的国际公共产品服务，助力推动构建开放型世界经济，让合作共赢惠及世界。

;

;总部位于荷兰的路易达孚集团全球首席执行官高启对“让中国大市场成为世界共享的大市场”感触颇深。高启表示，路易达孚在华发展50年来，不断深化与中国伙伴的合作。中国在全球经济中发挥重要作用，拥有巨大的市场潜力。 “我们希望积极融入中国市场，共同探索合作机遇。”

;

;巴西淡水河谷铁矿石业务亚太区市场董事总经理达特·奥利维拉表示，自2006年起，中国一直是淡水河谷最大的市场。 “中国坚持高水平开放，积极推动经济全球化，有助于加速技术和知识的传播，提升跨国企业创新力和竞争力。”

;

;在技术装备展区美国奥的斯展台，全球首发的“超级电梯”、全新自动扶梯吸引了不少观众。 “进博会为外企提供了接触中国市场、中国消费者的广阔平台。”奥的斯全球公司董事会主席朱蒂表示，近年来，奥的斯在中国业务快速发展，位于上海的研发中心是公司全球规模最大的研发基地。

;

;ABB（中国）有限公司董事长顾纯元表示，习近平主席的致信，展现了中国持续推动高水平开放、携手各方共同发展的诚意。 “进博会是一个推动创新与合作的高质量平台。越来越多的ABB创新技术从进博会出发，为推动数字化转型、实现可持续发展创造价值。”

;

;“去年我们首次参展，就感受到了进博会'展品变商品'的积极溢出效应，今年我们将展台面积扩大了5倍。”美国吉利德科学公司全球副总裁兼中国区总经理金方千表示，中国致力于为外资企业提供更加稳定优质的营商环境、带来更广阔的市场机遇，让在华外企更加坚定了深耕中国市场的信心。

;

;索尼（中国）有限公司总裁吉田武司表示，中国市场是索尼在全球最重要、最具潜力的市场之一。进博会是外企向中国市场展示自我的良好平台。 “我们期待发现更多'进博机遇''中国机遇'，不断加深与各方交流合作。”

;

;（本报记者俞懿春、赵益普、韩硕、杨迅、李晓宏、王海林、王佳可、王远、王慧、罗珊珊、姜泓冰、季觉苏、刘睿、周小苑、余秋雨、钱一彬）

;; Mon, 06 Nov 2023 05:56:03 +0800 02版要闻 - 中国将始终是世界发展的重要机遇（和音）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/06/nw.D110000renmrb_20231106_2-02.htm
;2023年11月06日星期一
; ;

;透过进博会这扇窗，国际社会再次看到中国同世界共享市场机遇的真诚愿望、推进高水平开放的坚定决心、推动构建开放型世界经济的积极行动    

;

;

;

;11月5日，习近平主席向第六届中国国际进口博览会致信，强调中国将始终是世界发展的重要机遇，将坚定推进高水平开放，持续推动经济全球化朝着更加开放、包容、普惠、平衡、共赢的方向发展。透过进博会这扇窗，国际社会再次看到中国同世界共享市场机遇的真诚愿望、推进高水平开放的坚定决心、推动构建开放型世界经济的积极行动。

;

;进博会是世界上第一个以进口为主题的国家级展会，致力于促进各方开放合作、互利共赢。2018年以来，进博会成功举办五届，依托中国大市场优势，发挥国际采购、投资促进、人文交流、开放合作平台功能，对加快构建新发展格局和推动世界经济发展作出了积极贡献。互利共赢的“进博故事”持续上演，“进博效应”令各方满怀期待。外国参展商纷纷表示，“进博会平台的重要性越来越显著”“期待进一步加深与中国市场的互惠发展”“将持续不断加码在华投资”。

;

;进博会是构建新发展格局的窗口，以中国新发展为世界提供新机遇。本届进博会，中国馆面积增至2500平方米，规模为历届之最。以“中国式现代化新成就为世界提供新机遇”为主题设立的“中国自由贸易试验区建设十周年成就展”，展示中国推进高水平开放和高质量发展的最新成果。这些充分表明，中国加快构建的新发展格局不是封闭的国内循环，而是更加开放的国内国际双循环，不仅满足中国自身发展需要，而且能够更好造福各国人民。从“中国将加快出台外商投资法规，完善公开、透明的涉外法律体系，全面深入实施准入前国民待遇加负面清单管理制度”，到“中国将继续鼓励自由贸易试验区大胆试、大胆闯，加快推进海南自由贸易港建设，打造开放新高地”，再到“推动货物贸易优化升级，创新服务贸易发展机制，扩大优质产品进口，创建'丝路电商'合作先行区”……中国持续通过进博会平台释放开放合作红利，生动诠释了“新时代，共享未来”的进博会主题。

;

;进博会是推动高水平开放的平台，让中国大市场成为世界共享的大市场。举办进博会是中国推进新一轮高水平对外开放的重大决策，是中国主动向世界开放市场的重大举措。今年，“老朋友”热情不减，约200家企业连续6年签约参展；“新朋友”不断加入，11个国家首次参加国家展，34个国家首次线下参加国家展；超过3400家参展商和近41万名专业观众注册报名，世界500强和行业龙头企业数量创历年新高……进博会质量和水平不断提升，充分表明不断扩大开放的中国具有强大吸引力。历久弥新的百年老店、勇立潮头的初创公司、实力雄厚的世界知名企业以及最不发达国家的中小企业，纷纷借助进博会平台进入中国市场，分享中国市场机遇，“看好中国市场”成为外国参展企业的共同心声。

;

;进博会提供全球共享的国际公共产品服务，助力推动构建开放型世界经济，让合作共赢惠及世界。当前，世界经济复苏动力不足，需要各国同舟共济、共谋发展。进博会交易的是商品和服务，交流的是文化和理念，迎的是五洲客，计的是天下利，具有鲜明的开放属性，不断从理念和实践上助力推动构建开放型世界经济。通过交流文化和理念，进博会不断汇聚开放合作的共识；通过交易商品和服务，进博会不断为世界经济发展注入开放合作的动能。本届进博会上，400多项代表性首发新产品、新技术、新服务集中亮相。本届虹桥论坛以“携手促发展  开放赢未来”为主题，22场分论坛议题覆盖绿色发展、数字经济、智能科技等热点，将为推动经济全球化、恢复全球经济活力、增强世界经济发展韧性凝聚广泛共识。

;

;各方积极赴约进博会，充分说明开放合作是历史潮流，互利共赢是人心所向。中国将坚定不移推进高水平对外开放，以更宽阔视野、更开放胸襟、更积极姿态，携手各方创造更加繁荣的美好未来。

;; Mon, 06 Nov 2023 05:56:03 +0800 02版要闻 - 李强出席第六届中国国际进口博览会开幕式并发表主旨演讲http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/06/nw.D110000renmrb_20231106_3-02.htm
;2023年11月06日星期一
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;11月5日，国务院总理李强在上海出席第六届中国国际进口博览会暨虹桥国际经济论坛开幕式，并发表主旨演讲。
;新华社记者翟健岚摄

;
; ;

;本报上海11月5日电  （记者田泓、杨迅、罗珊珊）11月5日，国务院总理李强在上海出席第六届中国国际进口博览会暨虹桥国际经济论坛开幕式，并发表主旨演讲。

;

;李强表示，习近平主席专门向本届进博会致信，重申了中国推进高水平开放、推动构建开放型世界经济的坚定决心。作为世界上第一个以进口为主题的国家级展会，进博会自举办以来，积极联通中国和世界，国际采购、投资促进、人文交流、开放合作四大平台作用不断增强，全球共享的国际公共产品属性更加彰显。

;

;李强在与大家分享了几个具体的“进博故事”后指出，经济全球化是历史大势、人心所向，开放合作、互利共赢是最明智也是最自然的选择。中国真诚希望与各国一道，在开放的大舞台上相向而行、相互成就，推动经济全球化朝着更加开放、包容、普惠、平衡、共赢的方向发展，为世界经济复苏和全球发展繁荣作出更大贡献。

;

;李强强调，今年是中国改革开放45周年。中国将持续推进“市场机遇更大”的开放，积极扩大进口，实施全国版和自贸试验区版跨境服务贸易负面清单，继续为世界创造巨大市场红利。持续推进“规则对接更好”的开放，打造自由贸易试验区、海南自由贸易港等更多高能级开放平台，积极推进加入《全面与进步跨太平洋伙伴关系协定》和《数字经济伙伴关系协定》，进一步放宽市场准入，依法保护外商投资权益。持续推进“创新动能更足”的开放，与各方加强创新合作与成果共享，努力打破制约创新要素流动的壁垒，深化数字经济领域改革，促进数据依法有序自由流动。持续推进“包容共享更强”的开放，坚定维护多边贸易体制权威性和有效性，全面深入参与世贸组织改革，坚定不移促进全球产业链供应链稳定，深化“一带一路”合作伙伴关系，坚决反对单边主义、保护主义。同时更好发挥上海在对外开放中的重要作用，推进上海自由贸易试验区高水平制度型开放，并在上海建设“丝路电商”合作先行区。

;

;澳大利亚总理阿尔巴尼斯，古巴总理马雷罗，哈萨克斯坦总理斯迈洛夫，塞尔维亚总理布尔纳比奇，伊朗第一副总统穆赫贝尔，南非副总统马沙蒂莱，越南副总理陈红河，阿塞拜疆副总理穆斯塔法耶夫，斐济副总理兼贸易部长卡米卡米加，尼加拉瓜总统投资、贸易和国际合作顾问奥尔特加，泰国副总理兼商业部长普坦，联合国贸易和发展会议秘书长格林斯潘，以及来自世界154个国家、地区和国际组织的政商学等各界代表约1500人出席开幕式。

;

;与会外国领导人在致辞中表示，进博会已成为全球经贸合作重要平台，体现了中国致力于深化改革、扩大开放的大国担当，愿同中方一道，进一步加强贸易、投资、科技、基础设施、电子商务、卫生健康等领域合作，推进“一带一路”建设，坚定支持自由贸易，支持世界贸易组织发挥权威作用，促进贸易投资自由化便利化，维护国际产业链供应链稳定畅通，实现世界包容可持续发展。

;

;开幕式前，李强参观了企业展。开幕式后，李强同与会外国领导人共同巡馆。

;

;何立峰、陈吉宁、吴政隆参加上述活动。

;; Mon, 06 Nov 2023 05:56:03 +0800 02版要闻 - 图片报道http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-11/06/nw.D110000renmrb_20231106_4-02.htm
;2023年11月06日星期一
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;

;
; ;

;第六届中国国际进口博览会上，共有72个国家和国际组织参加国家展。图为中国馆入口处的大屏幕。 

;

;本报记者  赵益普摄

; Mon, 06 Nov 2023 05:56:03 +0800
